DemosÂ¶

There are several demos for Gaussian process tasks in the package. We recomand you to have a look at Basic GP Regression before reading other demos, which will not only introduce the regression model, but provides a general insight of the package. You will also find the implementation of demos in the source folder under pyGP_OO/Demo.

Moreover, it may also be useful to have a look at our documentation on Kernels & Means and Optimizers.

Regression

  • Basic Regression
    • Import packages
    • Load data
    • A five-line toy example
    • A more complicated example
    • A bit more things you can do
  • Sparse Regression
    • First example -> default inducing points
    • Second example -> user-defined inducing points

Classfication

  • Basic Classification
    • Load data
    • First example -> state default values
    • Second example -> GP classification
    • A bit more things you can do
  • Sparse Classification
    • First example -> default inducing points
    • Second example -> user-defined inducing points
    • A bit more things you can do
  • Multi-class Classification

Validation

  • K-fold Cross-Validation
